text: Can you help me modify a reminder for my conference?
Sure! What is the new content and time for your reminder?
The new content is "Submit proposal" and the new time is "2023-03-25 14:00:00".
Alright. I need to authenticate you first. Please provide me with your username and password.
My username is user3 and my password is user3pass.
Your authentication was successful. Now, let me modify your reminder.
The reminder has been successfully modified.
